messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF LABOUR OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: In just a few weeks we will have the most important election for a generation. Our economy is burdened by huge debts and millions are out of work. Our society is broken by crime and irresponsible behaviour. Our political system is in a mess. We can't go on like this.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take bold action on all fronts to cut Labour's waste and debt to get our economy moving.
Support families and back people who do the right thing to encourage responsibility in our society.
Ensure pensioners are supported as well.

Need big changes in our political system, lead the way on cleaning up MPs' expenses and will finish the job by scrapping the perks and cutting the cost of Parliament. Take power away from the political elite to give more control over your life.

issues.economy: Our economy is burdened by huge debts and millions are out of work.
issues.environment: Glasgow has great parks but too many places are blighted by dumping, dog mess and litter.
issues.governance: Our political system is in a mess. We can't go on like this.
issues.health: The Conservatives are committed to protecting NHS funding â€“ even through the recession.
